pullrequest.title: Fix jenkins seeing static_assertion tests as build failures

content.raw:
How do you feel about the following patch to the sed commands?

~~~
diff -r 0ec0abc1cf45 test/static_assertions/testrunner.bash
--- a/test/static_assertions/testrunner.bash	Thu Jun 01 10:33:44 2017 -0700
+++ b/test/static_assertions/testrunner.bash	Mon Jun 05 10:53:58 2017 -0700
@@ -2,4 +2,6 @@
 
 # mess with output to confuse jenkins build failure indications because these
 # tests pass when compilation fails. Multiple pipes for OSX compatibility
-eval $@ 2>&1 | sed s/error/[Censored\ by\ testrunner.bash]/g | sed s/Error/[Censored\ by\ testrunner.bash]/g | sed s/Fail/[Censored\ by\ testrunner.bash]/g
+eval $@ 2>&1 \
+  | sed s/[Ee]rror/[Censored\ by\ testrunner.bash]/g \
+  | sed s/Fail/[Censored\ by\ testrunner.bash]/g
~~~
